Name: OPEC IDLE
About the game: Opec Idle is an incremental game with intuitive gameplay, without in-game purchases. The minimalistic graphics of the game will not catch anyone's eye on your working computer :) Game Features Pump the oil with a hand pump and sell it with existing containers. Buy new containers. Develop the field by buying automatic pumps. Hire smart sellers. Buy artifacts for them. Purchase potions to increase pump efficiency. Sign contracts to supply your oil to distant countries. Don't be afraid to start over! Each restart gives significant bonus skills in the game.
